description: We sat down to talk with this year's second place finisher at the Warhammer 40k World Championships to talk about his incredible run over the last three years, the event this year, and what's next.
title: WCW Player Interview: John Lennon Talks Astra Militarum, Placing Second, and What’s Next

description: As we hit the final straight for 2024, we check in on the team's hobby progress.
title: Goonhammer Hobby Round-Up: November 2024

description: Stormbringer is a weekly hobby magazine from Hachette Partworks introducing players to Warhammer: Age of Sigmar. In this 80-week series, our intrepid magazine-receiver will be reviewing each individual issue, its included models, and gaming materials. A Premium US subscription was provided to Goonhammer for review purposes. If you want to follow along at home, US […]
title: SRM’s Ongoing Stormbringer Review: Week 53

description: Welcome to Competitive Innovations, our weekly feature for a number of game lines across the tabletop wargame space. Each week our army list and tactics experts canvass the top tournaments for their game of specialty, looking at the week’s top match-ups and how they played out on the tabletop to let you know what’s hot, […]
title: [40K] Competitive Innovations in 10th: Cult Hits pt.2

description: Merry Grotmas! Today we're doing a deep dive into the Necrons' Starshatter Arsenal Detachment, looking at its rules, how to play it, and the impact it'll have on the meta.
title: Detachment Focus: Starshatter Arsenal

description: John from Can You Roll a Crit? is back again with his monthly stats show for Kill Team! With a full month of the new edition worth of data, he covers how the game performed globally at tournaments! Watch on to see how the stats have developed from last month, along with a look at […]
title: CYRAC: Kill Team November Tournament Stats

description: It was a night during Grotmas, and all 6++, did gather, to rank some detachments and such! Come join the party 😀 The 6++ Linktree Have any questions or feedback? title: That 6+++ Show | Episode 116: A 40K Tier List: Ranking the Best Detachments in the Game!
